languages.text: "Наивысшее преступление для Вольного Торговца... отринуть покровительство Императора и воцариться самовластно, как дерзкий соперник и впавший в хулу на Бога тиран-ересиарх".
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
languages.original_text: "Наивысшее преступление для Вольного Торговца... отринуть покровительство Императора и воцариться самовластно, как дерзкий соперник и впавший в хулу на Бога тиран-ересиарх".

traits.locale_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their own reign absolute, becoming a brash rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their own reign absolute, becoming a brash rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brash rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brash rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."
"For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

languages.text: “对行商浪人而言，最大的罪过就是……拒绝帝皇的庇护，认为自己拥有绝对的统治权，沦为厚颜无耻的帝皇之敌，成为亵渎神明的暴虐异端。”
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: “对行商浪人而言，最大的罪过就是……拒绝帝皇的庇护，认为自己拥有绝对的统治权，沦为帝皇凶蛮的敌人与亵渎神明的暴虐异端。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者にとって最も大きな罪は、皇帝の庇護を拒否し、自身の支配を絶対的にする事。結果として、神の敵となり、神を冒涜する暴虐な異端者となる」
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者にとって最も大きな罪は、皇帝の庇護を拒否し、自身の支配を絶対的にする事。結果として、神の敵となり、神を冒涜する暴虐な異端者となる」

languages.text: «Para un Comerciante Independiente el mayor de los crímenes es... rechazar la protección del Emperador y hacer de su reinado algo absoluto, convirtiéndose en un rival descarado de Dios y en un heresiarca tirano».
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: «Para un Comerciante Independiente el mayor de los crímenes es... rechazar la protección del Emperador y hacer de su reinado algo absoluto, convirtiéndose en un rival descarado de Dios y en un heresiarca tirano».

languages.text: "Für einen Freihändler ist das ultimative Verbrechen ... den Schutz des Imperators zurückzuweisen und sich selbst zum absoluten Herrscher aufzuschwingen, zu einem dreisten Rivalen Gottes und einem blasphemischen tyrannischen Häresiarchen."
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: "Für einen Freihändler ist das ultimative Verbrechen ... den Schutz des Imperators zurückzuweisen und sich selbst zum absoluten Herrscher aufzuschwingen, zu einem dreisten Rivalen Gottes und einem blasphemischen tyrannischen Häresiarchen."

languages.text: « Pour un libre-marchand, il n'est pire crime que de... rejeter la protection de l'Empereur et de devenir un souverain totalitaire, ce qui fait de lui un hérésiarque qui tente de rivaliser avec Dieu Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: « Pour un libre-marchand, il n'y a pas de pire crime que de... rejeter la protection de l'Empereur et devenir un souverain totalitaire, ce qui fait de lui un hérésiarque qui tente de rivaliser avec Dieu Lui-même. »

languages.text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in işleyebileceği en büyük suç, İmparator'un korumasını reddetmek ve kendi hükümdarlığını mutlak kılmak, utanmazca Tanrı'ya rakip olmak ve din dışı, ahlaksız bir tiranlık kurmaktır."
languages.original_text: "For a Rogue Trader, the ultimate crime is... to reject the Emperor's protection and make their reign absolute, becoming a brazen rival of God and a blasphemous tyrannical heresiarch."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'in işleyebileceği en büyük suç, İmparator'un korumasını reddetmek ve kendi hükümdarlığını mutlak kılmak, utanmazca Tanrı'ya rakip olmak ve din dışı, ahlaksız bir tiranlık kurmaktır."
